title: Gigabyte GA-H110M S2PH-DDR4 Motherboard
description: Micro ATX motherboard with M.2 heatsinks
keyfeatures: 8-channel HD Audio with High-Quality Audio Capacitors

title: ASRock H81M-VG4 R4.0 4th Gen Micro ATX Motherboard
description: The ASRock H81M-VG4 R4.0 4th Gen Micro ATX Motherboard supports Intel 4th Generation Intel Core Processors (Socket 1150) and Dual Channel DDR3 1600. The Motherboard comes with 1 PCIe 2.0 x16, 1 PCIe 2.0 x1. It features a D-Sub port for graphic output. It is built with a High-Density Glass Fabric PCB design that reduces the gaps between the PCB layers to protect the motherboard against electrical shorts caused by humidity. This ASRock motherboard uses a

title: BIOSTAR A520MH DDR4 AMD AM4 Micro ATX Motherboard
description: The BIOSTAR A520MH DDR4 AMD AM4 Micro ATX Motherboard is a high-performance motherboard designed for AMD Ryzen processors. It offers excellent compatibility and functionality for both the 3rd Gen (Matisse/Renoir) and 4th Gen (Vermeer) Ryzen processors. With its AMD A520 single-chip architecture, this motherboard delivers reliable and efficient performance. The motherboard supports up to 2-DIMM DDR4 memory modules, with speeds of up to DDR4-4933+(OC) supported. It offers a wide range of memory frequencies, including 4800(OC), 4600(OC), 4400(OC), 4000(OC), 3800(
keyfeatures: Supported CPU: Ryzen 3rd Gen and 4th Gen processors
Features: 1 x M.2 Slot, Realtek RTL8111H

title: MSI PRO H410M-B 10th Gen Micro-ATX Motherboard
description: he MSI PRO H410M-B Motherboard supports 10th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold & Celeron processors for LGA 1200 socket. It supports DDR4 Memory, up to 2933(Max) MHz. This motherboard helps users work smarter by delivering an efficient and productive experience. It features tons of convenient and smart designs for DIY users, countless system tuning and troubleshooting tools are at your disposal to push your system to new heights and satisfy ev
keyfeatures: Supports 10th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold & Celeron processors for LGA 1200 socket

title: Gamdias BOREAS E1L-010 RGB CPU Air Cooler
description: The Gamdias BOREAS E1L-010 is an RGB low-profile cooler with a premium stealth black finish intended for Intel LGA 1700 sockets. Its tiny yet powerful design fits seamlessly into all-in-one systems and numerous form factor designs, thanks to a sturdy 120mm hydraulic PWM fan, ARGB motherboard sync, a durable aluminum heatsink, and a well-designed DTC structure.
keyfeatures: Built-in RGB lighting with ARGB Motherboard sync

title: CoolMaster FrostFlow 2500 CPU Liquid Cooler
description: The CoolMaster FrostFlow 2500 is a high-performance liquid cooler designed for Intel and AMD sockets. Its advanced pump design, large 240mm radiator, and dual 120mm RGB fans provide excellent cooling for demanding CPUs. With support for ARGB synchronization and durable tubing, this cooler is perfect for enthusiasts and gamers.
keyfeatures: Support for Intel and AMD Sockets

title: Corsair AirPro 360 RGB CPU Cooler
description: The Corsair AirPro 360 is a top-tier RGB air cooler engineered for maximum cooling efficiency. Its 360mm high-density radiator, three powerful 120mm PWM fans, and direct-contact heat pipes ensure low temperatures even under heavy workloads. With customizable RGB lighting and software control, this cooler elevates your PC's aesthetics and performance.

title: NZXT Kraken X42 Liquid CPU Cooler
description: The NZXT Kraken X42 is a compact all-in-one liquid cooler optimized for Intel and AMD processors. Featuring a 140mm radiator and customizable RGB lighting on the pump, this cooler delivers efficient cooling performance and stunning aesthetics. Its CAM software allows precise control over fan and pump speeds, making it an excellent choice for overclockers and system builders.

title: DeepCool Assassin III Dual-Tower CPU Cooler
description: The DeepCool Assassin III is a high-performance dual-tower air cooler designed to tame the most demanding CPUs. Equipped with two powerful 140mm PWM fans, multiple heat pipes, and a nickel-plated base, this cooler efficiently dissipates heat and maintains low noise levels. Its black coating and brushed aluminum top cover add a touch of elegance to any build.

title: ASUS ROG Ryujin 360 Liquid CPU Cooler
description: The ASUS ROG Ryujin 360 is a high-end liquid cooler designed for extreme performance. With a 360mm radiator, three Noctua IndustrialPPC fans, and a LiveDash OLED display on the pump block, this cooler stands out in both cooling and aesthetics. Its 6-year warranty and reinforced sleeved tubing ensure reliability and longevity.

title: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro DDR4 RAM
description: The Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro is a high-performance DDR4 RAM kit with 16GB capacity and a speed of 3200MHz. Featuring stylish RGB lighting, it adds a touch of flair to your gaming rig. The XMP 2.0 support ensures easy overclocking for better performance.

title: G.Skill Ripjaws V Series DDR4 RAM
description: The G.Skill Ripjaws V Series is a high-performance DDR4 RAM kit with 32GB capacity and a speed of 3600MHz. Designed for gamers and enthusiasts, it delivers excellent performance and stability. The sleek heat spreader design not only looks great but also helps dissipate heat effectively.
keyfeatures: Optimized for Intel and AMD Platforms

title: Kingston HyperX Fury DDR4 RAM
description: The Kingston HyperX Fury is a reliable DDR4 RAM kit with 8GB capacity and a speed of 2666MHz. It is a cost-effective choice for entry-level gaming and everyday computing tasks. The low-profile heat spreader ensures compatibility with most CPU coolers.

title: Crucial Ballistix MAX RGB DDR4 RAM
description: The Crucial Ballistix MAX RGB is a high-end DDR4 RAM kit with a massive 64GB capacity and a blazing speed of 4000MHz. Designed for extreme performance, it is ideal for content creators and power users. The customizable RGB lighting adds a striking visual element to your system.

title: ADATA XPG Spectrix D60G DDR4 RAM
description: The ADATA XPG Spectrix D60G is a performance-oriented DDR4 RAM kit with 32GB capacity and a speed of 3200MHz. Its unique dual RGB light strip design creates a mesmerizing light show. The wide compatibility ensures seamless integration with various motherboards.

title: EVGA Supernova 750 G5 80+ Gold Modular Power Supply
description: The EVGA Supernova 750 G5 is a high-quality power supply with 750W output and 80+ Gold efficiency. Its fully modular design allows easy cable management, ensuring a clean and organized build. The whisper-quiet fan with a fluid dynamic bearing provides reliable and silent operation.

title: Corsair RM850x 80+ Gold Fully Modular Power Supply
description: The Corsair RM850x is a reliable and efficient power supply with 850W output and 80+ Gold certification. Its fully modular design simplifies cable management and enhances airflow. The Zero RPM fan mode ensures silent operation at low to medium loads, and the premium capacitors ensure stable power delivery.

title: Seasonic Focus GX-650 80+ Gold Full-Modular Power Supply
description: The Seasonic Focus GX-650 is a high-performance power supply delivering 650W of power with 80+ Gold efficiency. Its full-modular design allows for easy cable management, reducing clutter in your case. The hybrid silent fan control ensures efficient cooling and quiet operation.

title: Thermaltake Toughpower GF1 750W 80+ Gold Full Modular PSU
description: The Thermaltake Toughpower GF1 is a robust power supply delivering 750W of power with 80+ Gold efficiency. Its full modular design allows for flexible cable management, ensuring a neat and organized build. The high-quality capacitors and silent hydraulic bearings ensure stable performance and quiet operation.

title: Cooler Master MWE Gold 650 V2 Full Modular 80+ Gold PSU
description: The Cooler Master MWE Gold 650 V2 is a reliable power supply delivering 650W of power with 80+ Gold efficiency. Its full modular design allows for easy cable management, resulting in a clean and clutter-free setup. The silent LDB fan ensures quiet operation even under heavy loads.

title: Samsung 970 EVO Plus NVMe M.2 SSD
description: The Samsung 970 EVO Plus is a high-performance NVMe M.2 SSD with a storage capacity of 1TB. It delivers impressive read and write speeds, making it perfect for gaming, content creation, and data-intensive applications. The advanced V-NAND technology and robust controller ensure reliable performance.
keyfeatures: Sequential Read Speed: Up to 3,500 MB/s
Sequential Write Speed: Up to 3,300 MB/s

title: Western Digital Blue SATA SSD
description: The Western Digital Blue SSD is a reliable SATA SSD with a storage capacity of 500GB. It provides fast data access and transfer speeds, enhancing system responsiveness. With WD's free SSD dashboard software, monitoring and optimizing your drive's performance is a breeze.
keyfeatures: Sequential Read Speed: Up to 560 MB/s
Sequential Write Speed: Up to 530 MB/s

title: Crucial MX500 SATA SSD
description: The Crucial MX500 is a high-capacity SATA SSD with 2TB of storage. It offers fast read and write speeds, improving system boot times and overall performance. The drive is equipped with AES 256-bit hardware encryption for data security.
keyfeatures: Sequential Read Speed: Up to 560 MB/s
Sequential Write Speed: Up to 510 MB/s

title: Seagate BarraCuda 3.5" HDD
description: The Seagate BarraCuda is a high-capacity 3.5" HDD with 4TB of storage. It provides ample space for storing large files, games, and multimedia content. The drive's high data transfer rates ensure smooth performance and quick access to your data.

title: ADATA SU635 3D NAND SATA SSD
description: The ADATA SU635 is a budget-friendly SATA SSD with a storage capacity of 1TB. It uses 3D NAND technology to deliver improved efficiency and reliability. With read and write speeds that surpass traditional HDDs, it significantly improves system performance.
keyfeatures: Sequential Read Speed: Up to 520 MB/s
Sequential Write Speed: Up to 450 MB/s

title: LG 27GL850-B 27-Inch QHD Nano IPS Gaming Monitor
description: The LG 27GL850-B is a high-performance gaming monitor with a 27-inch QHD Nano IPS display. It offers fast 1ms response time and a 144Hz refresh rate, ensuring smooth gameplay. The monitor is G-SYNC compatible and features a wide color gamut for vibrant visuals.

title: ASUS TUF Gaming VG27AQ 27-Inch WQHD Monitor
description: The ASUS TUF Gaming VG27AQ is a 27-inch WQHD monitor designed for gaming enthusiasts. It boasts a 165Hz refresh rate and Adaptive-Sync technology for tear-free and smooth gaming. The IPS panel ensures accurate colors and wide viewing angles.

title: BenQ EX2780Q 27-Inch QHD IPS Entertainment Monitor
description: The BenQ EX2780Q is a 27-inch QHD IPS monitor optimized for entertainment. Its 144Hz refresh rate and FreeSync technology ensure a seamless gaming experience. The integrated treVolo speakers deliver immersive audio for movies and games.

title: Dell S2721D 27-Inch QHD LED Backlit Monitor
description: The Dell S2721D is a 27-inch QHD LED monitor with a slim and stylish design. Its IPS panel offers accurate colors and wide viewing angles. With ComfortView technology, it reduces blue light emission for comfortable extended use.

title: Acer Predator XB273K 27-Inch UHD Gaming Monitor
description: The Acer Predator XB273K is a premium UHD gaming monitor with a 27-inch display. It offers a fast 144Hz refresh rate and supports G-SYNC for tear-free gaming. The IPS panel ensures accurate colors and excellent image quality.

title: Logitech G502 HERO High-Performance Gaming Mouse
description: The Logitech G502 HERO is a high-performance gaming mouse with a responsive HERO 25K sensor for precise tracking. It features customizable RGB lighting and 11 programmable buttons for personalized gaming setups. The adjustable weight system allows you to fine-tune the mouse's feel to suit your preference.

title: HyperX Cloud Alpha S Gaming Headset
description: The HyperX Cloud Alpha S is a premium gaming headset designed for immersive audio experiences. Its dual-chamber drivers deliver rich and clear sound with improved distinction. The adjustable bass slider lets you customize the bass level to your liking. The detachable noise-cancelling microphone ensures clear voice communication.

title: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: The Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT is a premium mechanical gaming keyboard with Cherry MX key switches for reliable and precise keystrokes. It features per-key RGB backlighting and six dedicated macro keys for custom commands. The detachable wrist rest provides comfort during long gaming sessions.

title: Elgato Stream Deck Mini - Live Content Creation Controller
description: The Elgato Stream Deck Mini is a compact content creation controller designed for live streaming and content creation. It features six customizable LCD keys that can be programmed with actions, sound effects, and more. The Stream Deck software allows you to streamline your workflow with one-touch control.

title: Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger
description: The Anker PowerCore 26800 is a high-capacity portable charger to keep your devices powered on the go. It features three USB ports with PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies for fast and efficient charging. The huge 26,800mAh battery capacity can charge your smartphone multiple times before needing a recharge.
